string.text: Everything is fine. I would like to find out something.
Don't you know where my stuff was taken. There is one really valuable thing there.
All our stuff they hid somewhere in their own arsenal. In some place at the upper deck, at least my junk was taken there, when I was captured. I can't say more precisely.
Thanks! If I manage to get out of here - I'll go there in the first instance.
Do you have any ideas of how to get out of here?

While I was convoyed here, I've noticed a sewer system hatch under the stairs on the ground floor... If only there wes a chance to unlock the bars of the cell, we could use that passage to buzz off... And it's better to go to the West in the direction of the warehouses, where Freedom faction is located. There is a couple of vehicles on the way, seemed to be still functioning...
Well, nothing, I've changed my mind.
So we shouldn't expect for any help here?
Where from... but... not that you'v mentioned it, I've seen one stalker nearby. A scout. If I'm not mistaken, that was Vasya Petrovich.

Veteran, from old ones. Stalkers call him Petrovich. I've seen him many times, but never spoke to him. Respected stalker, rumors say that he found something \non the sly, some stash of artifacts or something. Well, he wasn't poor - that's clear. He had a good equipment and respect from all people, who stood treats \nfor him in bars often. If he hasn't been found by mercenaries with bandits, than he'll help us.
Do you know anything about local sights? That is when I'm going to scraper from here, I can turn to the wrong direction. So it would be good to orient myself here at least somehow.

The city is carved up into two cuts. The place we are standing at now is the territory of mercenaries, southwards lies the bandits' territory. Their base is in the school building in the south-westen city part. There is quite a number of ruined five-storey buildings between the bases. But there is a couple of almost safe buildings nearby. If need be they can be used as covers. Garages and a couple of small steadings nearby. Twosome of buildings at the side of bandits and few garages. On the opposite site of the square is the building of the former city council, deserted now it contains an abundance of anomalies there.
Tell me where have you been and what has happened to you in the last sortie to the center?
Have you come round, head's okay?
I remember nothing... neither what happened, nor who you are... nor even who am I. And what is about Gunslinger?!!
Whoa... well bro... you've really been socked... I'm Doctor and you are Gunslinger!!! We've been rambling into the Zone for 2 years... Can you really not remember that?

Damn it... I remember NOTHING at all... and the fact that militaries socked onto my head has nothing to do with it... I remember myself from the very moment, when I was dragged out from "death truck" half-dead at Cordon.
Oh, that's what it is... well... And do you remember our guys? Fang, Ghost?

Well... While I was investigating this thing, I found info, that Fang was put to sleep... in that very stash in catacombs where I was captured.. and one more... I've found the dead Ghost's body at Yantar... that was the time I realized that I've realized nothing... The snag is that I've been found, my PDA contained the task to kill Gunslinger with photo attached... but it was Ghost's photo! Will you enlighten me, what could this mean?
Fang is eliminated??? Ghost!!!??? Dead???!! Damn it!!! How could this come to be... they were... they were one of the best... were... Are you sure that you're not mistaken?
Sure... Dead sure... I'd deeply like to share your emotions, but I can't... their names were not more than the names of strangers... damn.. tell me what you think about all this crap...

Yeah, that's bizarre... The thought is that everything is somehow connected with you last sortie to the center of the Zone. When we saw each other last time, you left me the key from hidden stash at Prypyat and the scheme how to find it... I've managed to save it... mercenaries couldn't find it.. Here.. Pehaps you'll find something there...You also were mumbling that there is some dirty trick with Monolith.. This is right... But as far as I understand you didn't know what was it about yourself... Yeah, that's perhaps everything I can help you with...
Hm. That didn't ring a bell... So we knew how to pass by the radar to the center of the Zone. But I don't rememebr a hell, including the road to Prypyat. And how about you?
And I wasn't going with you last time. I'm too old for that...
Okay - later... Haven't you thought how to get out of here? By the way - where are we?
We are right in Dead City!.. At mercenaries' camp..
